column5: This beautiful fourplex home is walking distance to a local bakery, coffee shop, playground, bank, meat market, and a short drive to The Pearl Brewery, airport, many museums, downtown, Alamo, and the beautiful riverwalk! You will love the old charm and cozy ambiance of this 1800s historic apartment and neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers! No furry friends please :)
